skill.description: Deals **280% Earth damage** to a single enemy, inflicts **Attack Down** (-30%, last 60s). Gains **Counterattack** (2 turns)
skill.name: Heat Cut
skill.upgrade: **After strengthening:** Increase damage, inflicts 1 stack of **Bleeding**

skill.description: **Consumes 40% own HP**. Grants all allies **Shield** (5000, until destroyed) and **Defense Up** (55%, 3 turns)
skill.name: Stirring

resonance.description: Deals **420% Earth damage** to a single enemy, inflicts 1 stack of **Bleeding** (1500 damage per stack, debuff resist small down, max 10 stacks, last 70s). Grants **30% Enmity** (3 turns) to all allies.
resonance.name: Abyssal Automation

passive.description: At the start of battle, gains **Revive**. Increase own **Hate**. When attacking enemies inflicted with **Bleeding**, increases **Enhanced Attack Rate**
passive.name: Unforgettable Sin

passive.description: Increases self Water Defense. If HP is less than 50%, increases defense. If HP is less than 25%, further increases defense.
passive.name: Secret Obsession
passive.upgrade: **After strengthening:** If own HP is less than 50%, increase defense

passive.description: If HP is less than 40%, gains **Absorption** (1000, 3 turns) after using **Burst**.
passive.name: Synchronized Blessing
